channel.title: Server Help
channel.description: Okay, so i think i did everthing, i made the file compile.bat and runserver.bat so i compiled everthing (i think) i just doubleclicked it, then stuff happend. then i just clicked run server, then stuff happend, and so i try to log on server, and it doesnt work

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Tramposch Tramposch
item.description:
@Tramposch wrote:

then what do you log on with?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Hotaru Lord Hotaru
item.description:
@Lord_Hotaru wrote:

Yes next to ip on your client, if your running it off of your own computer then you cant log on with using your no-ip name.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Tramposch Tramposch
item.description:
@Tramposch wrote:

What what do you mean by the ip, you mean in… the client? This is just a big update, we moved hosts to another computer, and then it didnt work, it worked before with rksscape.no-ip.org

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Hotaru Lord Hotaru
item.description:
@Lord_Hotaru wrote:

Ok, first of all if your compiler says 100 errors that isn’t good, and where it says ip dont put rksscape.no-ip.org put either localhost, nothing there, or 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Tramposch Tramposch
item.description:
@Tramposch wrote:

rksscape.no-ip.org

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6
at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312)
at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:39)
at server.main(server.java:28)
Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555

Thats what happend when i clicked runserver… is that bad?

and when i clicked compile… a ton of stuff came up, and at the bottom it said “100 errors”

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Hotaru Lord Hotaru
item.description:
@Lord_Hotaru wrote:

What did you type in for the ip, and post what the text said on your compiler.
